abstract: “American Gladiators,” NBC’s surprise hit during the writers’ strike, made a disappointing return to network television on Monday after a three-month hiatus, drawing just 4.9 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: “American Gladiators,” NBC’s surprise hit during the writers’ strike, made a disappointing return to network television on Monday after a three-month hiatus, drawing just 4.9 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
